funAndEarn: fun & earn — we’re all about that
findBRO: find letters B, R, O under the cells and get your points — you need them to get bigger airdrop
inNotEnough: if given tickets aren’t enough, hit up "Earn" for more earning opportunities
bringUrBros: bring ur bros along using ur ref link, vibe together, and score a cut from their earnings too!
stayTuned: stay tuned 'n be active in our brotherhood
dontForgetEvery8Hours: and don’t forget to show up every 8 hours to grab ur loot from the farm – it’s free stuff, why miss out
noResponsibleForAd: Bro, we are not responsible for advertising. Don't connect your main wallet anywhere. DYOR.
earningsForGiveaways: We'll use all earnings for giveaways, sir
broOrNot: bro or not bro? ur turn to pick
comeBackTomorrow: Come back tomorrow for check-in day (NUMBER)
tipSkipping: Tip: Skipping a day resets your check-in
